verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Heart of God, Sacred Three
Holy One True Deity
Enflame all things with love of Thee
Heart of Jesus burn in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Heart of God fire and light
Flame of Love burning bright
Come illuminate our night
Immortal One give me sight

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Heart of God on which we're fed
Unto your banquet we are led
We believe what you have said
I worship you O living bread

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Heart of God, the great I Am
Yahweh Lord and true God-man
Holy pure celestial lamb
Source of grace and promised land

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Heart of God, living spring
Well of love from which we drink
Draw us up and draw all in
Make me one with you my King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Heart of God, joyful rest
The breath of peace is your caress
I lie in love upon your breast
In your embrace we are wed.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Heart of God, Sacred Three
Holy One True Deity
Enflame all things with love of Thee
Heart of Jesus burn in me
